App Name: Nail Salon 3D

App Package Name: com.tintash.nailsalon

Brief: Indulge in the intricate and creative world of manicures with "Nail Salon 3D," a game that offers a delightful simulation of the nail beautification process. This engaging game provides players with a virtual canvas to fix up nails of all shapes and sizes, upgrade their own salons, and serve a roster of high-profile VIP clients. The game combines the joy of nail art with the satisfaction of managing and expanding a salon business.

  • Salon Upgrade System: Transform a humble space into a high-end salon with luxury furniture and cutting-edge equipment üõãÔ∏è.
  • VIP Clientele: Attract and service exclusive clients, adding an element of surprise and recognition as they visit your salon üíÖ.
  • Realistic Simulation Experience: Immerse in a near-authentic nail salon environment, even if you're not leaving the house, through a detailed nail simulator ü§ñ.
  • Dynamic Content Updates: Receive continuous updates with new features, including clients, tools, and colors, keeping the gameplay fresh and engaging üîÑ.

  • Internet Requirements: The need for internet connection for updates and accessing certain features might limit playability for some users üåê.
